thread.title: Danny Dyer eyes up Doctor Who role and thinks he could 'easily' be a Time Lord
thread.title_full: Danny Dyer eyes up Doctor Who role and thinks he could 'easily' be a Time Lord - Mirror Online

author: mirror.co.uk
title: Danny Dyer eyes up Doctor Who role and thinks he could 'easily' be a Time Lord
text:
Danny Dyer eyes up Doctor Who role and thinks he could 'easily' be a Time Lord The cockney actor wants to swap the Queen Vic and a pint for the TARDIS and a sonic screwdriver Share Comments By Alistair McGeorge 07:43, 9 FEB 2017 Updated 08:04, 9 FEB 2017 TV Danny Dyer wants Doctor Who role (Photo: BBC / Getty) Share Comments Get soaps Danny Dyer is eyeing up a potential switch from the Queen Vic to the Time Lord's TARDIS after admitting he's interested in being the next Doctor Who .
The EastEnders actor's contract is up soon, and he has already thrown his name into the hat to take over from Peter Capaldi when his version of the iconic character regenerates after the next series.
"I'd be interesting in it. I could see myself in the scarf and all that," he told the Daily Star.
Could Danny Dyer go into the TARDIS? (Photo: BBC) "I think I could do it easy. I'd keep my accent too."
Read More Danny Dyer: EastEnders star reckons he could take on Benedict Cumberbatch's Sherlock role It's something his fans are certainly interested in seeing, with an online petition gathering pace.
He could be set to leave Albert Square (Photo: BBC) Video Loading Video Unavailable Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Watch Next Jessie Wallace and Shane Richie swap roles for A Watch this video again Watch Next Lip Sync Battle UK: Craig Revel Horwood vs Danny 0:37 Explosion on the Paris metro just moments ago 0:33 7 police cars and undercover outside Ealing Broad 0:37 'Hit and run driver' races through crowded street 1:14 Rightwing activist Jack Buckby says 'take in a Sy 0:29 MPs vote to trigger Brexit by landslide in final 0:42 Deputy Speaker Lindsay Hoyle shouts at the house 0:59 Cancer victim slams NHS care in a heartbreaking v 2:15 Martin Clunes harangued by shopper for parking in 1:31 Video will play in Danny Dyer channels Amy Winehouse on Lip Sync Battle Share this video Watch Next "My understanding is that Danny Dyer has a contract in EastEnders until October this year. Mr Dyer should then move into the position of the new Doctor," it reads.
Read More Doctor Who bosses urged to cast woman as next Timelord - by three men who had the role Who will be the next Doctor Who lead? It's time for a new Time Lord after Peter Capaldi quits the TARDIS
Danny hasn't hidden the fact he wants to try other roles - having cast his EastEnders future in doubt following the NTAs last month .
Peter Capaldi is leaving Doctor Who after the next series (Photo: BBC) Video Loading Video Unavailable Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Watch this video again Video will play in Share this video Watch Next "Four years is a long time," he admitted. "It's been really rewarding but there's other stuff out there.
"Iâ€™d love to show other sides to me, I loved theatre and all that."
